content.rendered:
PADI DISCOVER SCUBA DIVING
Our Discover Scuba Diving course is the perfect introduction to the underwater world!!! First we go to the pool for some basic diving skills, and then we head out to the ocean for a dive on one of our gorgeous reefs.A PADI instructor will be right next to you at all times to keep you safe and show you some of the amazing creatures that live in our waters. For 90$us you can see a whole new world in a single afternoon- so what are you waiting for!!!
BOOK NOW

jetpack-related-posts.title: Home –
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Scuba Diving & Snorkeling Come and join the excitement with our diving team! Tripadvisor 5X HALL OF FAME WINNER WHY DIVE WITH US? Every day we schedule 2 morning boat dives (at 9.00 and 11.00), 2 in the afternoon (at 1.00 and 2.30), and night dives, when requested. We ask…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Snorkeling
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Snorkeling Discover The Under Water World Discover the underwater world and visit colorful reefs – no experience required! Let our professional staff guide you through the tropical coral and marine life right on our doorstep. All of our trips include a professional guide with a fish identification card and your…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Our Team
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Alejandro Diaz Assistant Instructor Padi #242294 Mangia Gianluca Master Scuba Diver Trainer Padi #331835

jetpack-related-posts.title: PADI Open Water Certification
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Complete this course to gain a lifelong certification that allows you to dive anywhere in the world. Our instructors are passionate about diving and the ocean and love introducing people to the underwater world!!The course can be completed in as little as 3 days. It begins in the classroom with…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Paradise Island
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you’re looking for something special, look no further. This all day trip includes 3 meals, private transportation to Paradise Island (known locally as Cayo Arena), and guided snorkeling around one of the Dominican Republic’s most beautiful reefs. The day starts early at 7.30, where we meet and begin our journey to…
